name: PockMine
profile: PockMine为BigBang Core官方钱包应用，采用“云钱包+HD钱包”并行的双钱包结构，最大程度保障了用户的资产安全，为用户提供简单便捷、安全可靠的数字资产存储服务。云钱包现已支持BBC、USDT、BTC、ETH等币种，HD钱包则支持BBC及BBC支链中的各种Token。同时，PockMine更是全球首个支持EDPoS投票的手机客户端，并且兼顾CPoW和EDPoS双共识玩法。注册用户可以免费获得CPoW挖矿算力，产出的BBC可直接在应用内参与BBC EDPoS投票获取收益。
profileEn: PockMine is the official wallet APP for BigBang Core. It applies the "cloud wallet + HD wallet" paralleled dual-wallets structure, which guarantees the security of users' assets to the greatest extent, and provides a simple, convenient, safe and reliable digital asset storage service. Cloud wallet currently supports BBC, USDT, BTC, ETH and other currencies, while HD wallet supports BBC and all kinds of tokens in BBC branch chain. In the meantime, PockMine is the first client end on mobile that supports EDPoS voting in the world and considers both CPoW and EDPoS in the dual-consensus way. Registered users can get free CPoW mining computing power, and the BBC output can directly participate in the BBC EDPoS voting in the APP to generate earnings.

name: PockChains
profile: PockChains（口袋云课堂）是公链BigBang Core的旗下品牌，是一个集学习、投资理财、分享推广于一体的综合平台。涵盖了金融投教、区块链行业相关课程，满足用户多元化学习的需求。在这里，每一个渴求知识的人都可以获得有质量保障的学习资源。
profileEn: PockChains is a brand of BigBang Core, a comprehensive platform integrating learning, investment and financial management, and sharing and promotion. It covers financial investment education and related courses in the blockchain industry to meet users' diverse learning needs. Here, everyone who desires knowledge can obtain quality-guaranteed learning resources.

name: BBC Russia
profile: 由BigBang Core海外用户自发组成的第一个海外社区。CPoW期间，在矿池的防DDoS攻击防护工作以及技术反馈上做出了重要贡献 。
profileEn: The first overseas community spontaneously composed of users of BigBang core abroad. It made great contribution to the anti-DDoS-attack protection work of the mining pool and giving technical feedback during CPoW.

name: BBC Foundation
profile: 由来自香港、新加坡，马来西亚等国家和地区的著名投资人和投资机构组成的实体联盟 。
profileEn: An entity alliance formed by well-known investors and investment institutions from Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia and other countries and regions.

name: BBCNET
profile: BigBang Core国内第一批忠实粉丝群体，同时也是国内最大的社群，囊括了各个行业的人才，看中BigBang Core的落地价值与技术能力，长期与项目共同发展 。
profileEn: The first batch of fans of BigBang Core, which is also the largest community in China. It includes talents from all industries who affirm the landing value and technical capability of BigBang Core and develop together with the projects for the long term.

name: BBC Stake
profile: BBC Stake是口袋云课堂官方推出的理财产品，通过口袋云课堂参与BBC Stake， 可获取月化9%-36%的BBC投资收益。前往 https://www.pockchains.io 下载口袋云课堂，了解更多信息。
profileEn: BBC Stake is a wealth management product launched by PockChains. You can participate in BBC Stake through PockChains and get 9% -36% of the BBC income monthly. Go to https://www.pockchains.io and download PockChains for more information.

name: BBC Malaysia
profile: BBC Malaysia 是来自马来西亚，新加坡等国家及中国台湾地区专业的价值投资导师组成的价值投资体联盟构成，专业的导师引领投资导向，携手共创未来。
profileEn: BBC Malaysia is a value investment alliance formed by professional investment mentors, from Malaysia, Singapore and other countries and Taiwan, China. Professional mentors lead the investment direction and work together to create the future.

name: BBC WenZhou
profile: 由温州超级社区搭建，社区成员均为各行各业的人才以及区块链投资者，社区成员团结一致，秉持相同的信念，携手前行。
profileEn: Built by the Wenzhou Super Community, it includes talents from various industries and blockchain investors. All members are united, uphold the same beliefs, and move forward hand in hand.

name: CJ Community
profile: 从BBCNet社区诞生的超级社区，同时，也是由大批BigBang Core早期忠实粉丝组建的大型社区之一。
profileEn: The super community born from the BBCNet is also one of the large communities formed by a large number of early loyal fans of BigBang Core.

name: BBC devotees
profile: BBC devotees 是由BBCNET忠实粉丝共同搭建，同时也吸引到各行各业的人才以及区块链爱好者。社区将同BigBang Core携手同行，共同打造BBC生态落地。
profileEn: BBC devotes is built by loyal fans of bbcnet, and it also attracts talents from all walks of life and blockchain enthusiasts. The community will join hands with BigBang core to create BBC ecological landing.

name: BBC KaiYuan
profile: 我们是由海南、湖南、福建及全球区块链爱好者组成，同时也是早期一路跟随BBCNet社区，不离不弃的忠实粉丝们参与而组建的节点，大家秉承共商共建共享共赢的理念，携手并进，以开放姿态不断与外界进行物质、能量和信息交换，吐故纳新，生生不息，并以极大的战略定力坚守互联互通、共建共赢为发展基石，一起开拓未来新奇迹。
profileEn: We are composed of Hainan, Hunan, Fujian and global blockchain enthusiasts. We are also a node formed by the participation of loyal fans who follow the BBCNet community all the way in the early days. We are adhering to the concept of joint consultation, joint construction, sharing and win-win, and go hand in hand.  With an open attitude, continue to exchange material, energy and information with the outside world, spit out the old and absorb the new, endlessly, and with great strategic determination, adhere to interconnection and mutual construction as the cornerstone of development, and jointly develop new miracles in the future.

name: BBC Singapore
profile: 新加坡投资导师曾帮助多家企业上市的宝贵经验，是一群有着丰富经验的资深金融专家，在诸多领域拥有超过30年的投资经验。为诸多私人和上市公司提供金融和咨询服务，拥有多年与国内外各种类型企业合作以及投资的经验。未来将会把实体企业与BigBangCore紧密合作。促进生态发展。
profileEn: There’s a group of established investment mentors from Singapore whom possess more than 30 years of investment experience. Over the years, they have been helping numerous private & listed companies, provide consultation and financial services to various private and listed companies. They aim to combine the BigBangCore technology in the business ecological in the future.

name: BIG SUPPLY CORE
profile: BIG SUPPLY CORE是由新加坡基金会发起成立。BIG SUPPLY CORE定位为BIG BANG技术支持的区块链与物联网结合的产品供应链，社会上优质的物联网企业，物联网设备自动化产生出来的数据通过BIGBANG技术提供源头真实数据上链（非人工数据）。物联网数据自动上链彻底解决的人工数据上联源头数据造假问题。
profileEn: Big Supply Core is founded by the Singapore's foundation which incorporates the blockchain technology invented by Bigbangcore and Internet of Things to provide a large database to increase a company's efficiency. The technology involves complex encryption, ensuring high security of data, and unable to be edited by anyone, in any ways.

name: BTCA
profile: BTCA超级节点是由BTCA共识者者共同发起，为促进BTCA生态健康发展而搭建，未来BTCA共识者将会携手BBC共识者，一起为BBC公链生态而努力！
profileEn: BTCA super node is jointly initiated by BTCA consensus contributors and is built to promote the healthy development of BTCA ecology. In the future, BTCA consensus contributors will join hands with BBC consensus contributors to work together for BBC public chain ecology!
